document_data.name: Bryseis Kakistos
document_data.mainbody: '''Bryseis Kakistos''', a.k.a. '''Bysera''', was a [[tiefling]] [[warlock]] who lived near [[Vaasa]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

History.Legacy:
Very little was known about Bryseis, other than that she was the leader of the [[Toril thirteen]], the original thirteen [[tiefling]] warlocks who made pacts with [[Asmodeus]].{{Cite digital book/Brimstone Angels/Kindle|1827}} She was said by the [[cambion]] [[Lorcan]] to have been a thoroughly wicked person who was partially responsible for Asmodeus's ascension to [[deity|godhood]].{{Cite digital book/Lesser Evils|5252}}

One of her tiefling descendants named [[Farideh]] became a warlock in [[1477 DR]] when she made a pact with the [[cambion]] [[Lorcan]].{{Cite digital book/Brimstone Angels/Kindle|344}} She also has descendants in Lachs the Yellow, a warlock pacted to [[Shetai]] the Paelyrion; Nasmos, pacted to a bone devil named [[Incus]]; and Adastreia Tyrianicus, pacted to a [[Logokron devil|Logokron]] from the 8th layer named [[Kulaga]].
